channel.title: Post random true facts
channel.description:
The dot over the letter "i" is called a tittle. It's impossible to kill yourself by holding your breath. Lightening is 3 times hotter than the surface of the sun. The surface temperature of our sun is around 10,000 degrees Farenheit, while lightening is 30,000 degrees. Death is more universal the life, everyone dies, not everyone lives. If a man watches a woman undress in front of a window, he can be arrested as a peeping tom, if a woman watches a man undress in front of a window, she can have him arrested for indecent exposure. A sneeze can exceed the speed of 100 mph. The rarest blood type in the world is type A-H, less than 12 people have it. You consume 1/10 of a calorie every time you lick a stamp. Some lions mate 50 times a day. (lucky s.o.b.'s) No word rhymes with month, purple, orange or silver. Hummingbirds are the only animals that can fly backwards. Coca-Cola would be green if coloring weren’t added to it. In the Scottish language Gaidhlig (Gaelic), there is no word for 'yes' or 'no'. "Almost" is the longest word with all the letters in alphabetical order. All polar bears are left-handed. Dreamt is the only word ending in "mt." Crocodiles have 2 penises... (damn. Animals are so lucky. stare ) A pig's orgasm can last 30 minutes.. The name of all the continents end with the same letter that they start with. Almonds are a member of the peach family. You blink about 25,000 times a day. Blonds have more hair than dark haired people do. When you sneeze, all your bodily functions stop, even your heart. The average human eats 8 spiders in his/ her lifetime at night. The human heart creates enough pressure to squirt blood 30ft. Peanuts are one of the ingredients in dynamite. Dolphins and humans are the only mammals that have sex for pleasure. Bruce Lee was so fast that they actually had to slow the film down so you could see his moves. *Ninety percent of all species that have become extinct have been birds. *Jimi Hendrix pretended to be gay to be discharged from the US Army. *Any month that starts on a Sunday will have a Friday the 13th in it. *Europe and North America are drifting apart at the same speed a human finger nail grows. *A snail can sleep for three years. *Adolf Hitler was Time magazine's Man of the Year in 1938. Cows can go up the stairs but not down. Turtles can breathe through their a**s. The king of hearts is the only king without a moustache on a standard playing card. A cockroach can live several weeks with its head cut off - it dies from starvation. It's impossible to sneeze with your eyes open. Only female mosquitoes bite. A polar bears fur is not white, it is infact clear.
Pigs can not look up at the sky.
In England, every boy over fourteen years of age most learn archery.
5% of the human population is homosexual.
A giraffe can lick it's own ear.

item.title: Post random true facts
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

If you have five dollars and Chuck Norris has five dollars, Chuck Norris has more money than you.

There is no ‘ctrl’ button on Chuck Norris’s computer. Chuck Norris is always in control.

Apple pays Chuck Norris 99 cents every time he listens to a song.

Chuck Norris can sneeze with his eyes open.

Chuck Norris can eat just one Lay’s potato chip.

Chuck Norris is suing Myspace for taking the name of what he calls everything around you.

Chuck Norris destroyed the periodic table, because he only recognizes the element of surprise.

Chuck Norris can kill two stones with one bird.

Read full topic
